segments.text: Fred , we're gonna have a meeting after half an hour . Have you got it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that true ? I can't believe it . There are always some meetings in this company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hush ! The wall has ears , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But , my overwork has not done yet . And it is driving me crazy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My boy . I give you my sympathy to you . However , this meeting is said to be extremely important , so we have to attend it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is to give honors and promotions to some colleagues who made outstanding performance last year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be there after 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
